text: I tell you that He will get justice for them quickly.God's ‘quickly’ doesn't always seem that ‘quick’ to us. However, when the Son of the Man comes, will He actually find the faith on the earth?”The Text clearly has ‘the faith’, referring to the sum of Truth that makes up the biblical Faith. The Lord's question is precisely to the point. Aside from the generalized apostasy that characterizes ‘Christian’ churches today, how many ‘conservative’ pastors are genuinely committed to the objective authority of the biblical Text?
